name: StackOverFlow Dark Mode (2020 Version Updated)
description: This style affects stackoverflow.com. This is not like the other StackOverFlow themes, this fixes font colors, random white spaces*, and black text. Some things like the home squares are half white due to some issues with the StackOverFlow website.
css: [class~=s-notice__info]{border-left-color:#fff;}h1,h3,h2,.p8 s-btn grid grid__center fc-dark,h4,p,h6,a::hover,a:hover,[class~=nav-links] [class~=nav-links--link]:hover,h5,body{color:#fff;}div,body{background-color:#1d1d1d;}[class~=fc-dark]:hover,[class~=nav-links] [class~=nav-links--link]:hover{color:grey;}[class~=fc-dark]:hover{background-color:grey;}[class~=s-notice__info]{border-bottom-color:#fff;}[class~=s-notice__info]{border-right-color:#fff;}[class~=s-anchors][class~=s-anchors__grayscale] a:not([class~=s-link]):hover,code,button,a,[class~=top-bar] [class~=-marketing-link],#question-header [class~=question-hyperlink],pre,[class~=grid]{color:#fff;}header{background-color:#1d1d1d !important;}[class~=s-notice__info]{border-top-color:#fff;}[class~=s-notice__info]{background-color:transparent;}#content,aside,[class~=s-toast] js-toast js-stacks-managed-popup js-fades-with-aria-hidden,ul{background-color:#1d1d1d;}[class~=fc-dark],[class~=about-page] [class~=new-about-content-page] h2[class~=about-title]{color:#fff !important;}.grid{color:black;}pre{background-color:lightgrey;}code{background-color:transparent;}.p8 s-btn grid grid__center fc-dark{background-color:#fff;}
